// Blasphemer (PvP)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP): "The legendary Chaperone everyone asked for. [...] And the Curated version is just too amazing." Recommended MW - Range or Reload.

// Premonition (PvP)

// Heretic (PvP)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP): "Finally a rocket that can compete in today’s meta. There’s a small “exploit” with sunbracers and this rocket with Demo and Cluster bombs, but that’s not exactly everyone’s cup of tea." Recommended MW - Blast Radius.
